report.title: Live Data
report.query: select s.id as id, l.name, s.date_start, s.date_end, s.updated_on, sav1.text_value as username, sav2.text_value as email, sav3.int_value as userid, (CASE sav4.int_value WHEN 0 THEN 'Non' ELSE 'Oui' END) as complete, sav5_t.term::text as protocol, l.centroid_sref as sref, li.path as location_image_path, ARRAY(select t.term::text from location_attribute_values lav LEFT JOIN (termlists_terms tt JOIN terms t ON t.id = tt.term_id AND t.language_id = #language_id#) ON tt.meaning_id = lav.int_value WHERE lav.deleted = false and lav.location_id = l.id and lav.location_attribute_id = 1)::text as habitat, lav1.int_value as nearesthive, foi.path as flower_image_path, (CASE WHEN fd.taxa_taxon_list_id IS NOT NULL THEN ft.taxon ELSE (ARRAY(select ft2.taxon FROM taxa_taxon_lists fttl2 INNER JOIN taxa ft2 ON fttl2.taxon_id = ft2.id WHERE fttl2.id = ANY (fd.taxa_taxon_list_id_list) ))::text END) as flowertaxon, fd.taxon_extra_info as flower_extra_info, oav1_t.term::text as flowertype, session.date_start as session_date, (CASE sav6.int_value WHEN 0 THEN 'Non' ELSE 'Oui' END) as shade, sav7_t.term::text as wind, sav8_t.term::text as temp, sav9_t.term::text as sky, sav10.text_value as endtime, sav11.text_value as starttime, ioi.path as insect_image_path, (CASE WHEN id.taxa_taxon_list_id IS NOT NULL THEN it.taxon ELSE (ARRAY(select it2.taxon FROM taxa_taxon_lists ittl2 INNER JOIN taxa it2 ON ittl2.taxon_id = it2.id WHERE ittl2.id = ANY (id.taxa_taxon_list_id_list) ))::text END) as insecttaxon, id.taxon_extra_info as insect_extra_info, (CASE oav2.int_value WHEN 0 THEN 'Non' ELSE 'Oui' END) as foraging, oav3_t.term::text as numberinsects from samples s INNER JOIN locations l ON l.id = s.location_id and l.deleted = false INNER JOIN location_images li ON l.id = li.location_id and li.deleted = false LEFT JOIN sample_attribute_values sav1 ON sav1.sample_id = s.id AND sav1.sample_attribute_id = 19 AND sav1.deleted = false LEFT JOIN sample_attribute_values sav2 ON sav2.sample_id = s.id AND sav2.sample_attribute_id = 8 AND sav2.deleted = false LEFT JOIN sample_attribute_values sav3 ON sav3.sample_id = s.id AND sav3.sample_attribute_id = 18 AND sav3.deleted = false LEFT JOIN sample_attribute_values sav4 ON sav4.sample_id = s.id AND sav4.sample_attribute_id = 20 AND sav4.deleted = false LEFT JOIN sample_attribute_values sav5 ON sav5.deleted = false and sav5.sample_id = s.id and sav5.sample_attribute_id = 21 LEFT JOIN (termlists_terms sav5_tt JOIN terms sav5_t ON sav5_t.id = sav5_tt.term_id AND sav5_t.language_id = #language_id#) ON sav5_tt.meaning_id = sav5.int_value LEFT JOIN location_attribute_values lav1 ON lav1.location_id = l.id AND lav1.location_attribute_id = 2 AND lav1.deleted = false INNER JOIN occurrences fo ON fo.sample_id = s.id and fo.deleted = false INNER JOIN determinations fd ON fo.id = fd.occurrence_id and fd.deleted = false and fd.id = (select max(fd2.id) from determinations fd2 where fd2.occurrence_id = fo.id and fd2.deleted = false) INNER JOIN occurrence_images foi ON fo.id = foi.occurrence_id and foi.deleted = false LEFT JOIN taxa_taxon_lists fttl ON fd.taxa_taxon_list_id = fttl.id LEFT JOIN taxa ft ON fttl.taxon_id = ft.id LEFT JOIN occurrence_attribute_values oav1 ON oav1.deleted = false and oav1.occurrence_id = fo.id and oav1.occurrence_attribute_id = 3 LEFT JOIN (termlists_terms oav1_tt JOIN terms oav1_t ON oav1_t.id = oav1_tt.term_id AND oav1_t.language_id = #language_id#) ON oav1_tt.meaning_id = oav1.int_value INNER JOIN samples session ON session.parent_id = s.id AND session.deleted = false LEFT JOIN sample_attribute_values sav6 ON sav6.sample_id = session.id AND sav6.sample_attribute_id = 27 AND sav6.deleted = false LEFT JOIN sample_attribute_values sav7 ON sav7.deleted = false and sav7.sample_id = session.id and sav7.sample_attribute_id = 26 LEFT JOIN (termlists_terms sav7_tt JOIN terms sav7_t ON sav7_t.id = sav7_tt.term_id AND sav7_t.language_id = #language_id#) ON sav7_tt.meaning_id = sav7.int_value LEFT JOIN sample_attribute_values sav8 ON sav8.deleted = false and sav8.sample_id = session.id and sav8.sample_attribute_id = 25 LEFT JOIN (termlists_terms sav8_tt JOIN terms sav8_t ON sav8_t.id = sav8_tt.term_id AND sav8_t.language_id = #language_id#) ON sav8_tt.meaning_id = sav8.int_value LEFT JOIN sample_attribute_values sav9 ON sav9.deleted = false and sav9.sample_id = session.id and sav9.sample_attribute_id = 24 LEFT JOIN (termlists_terms sav9_tt JOIN terms sav9_t ON sav9_t.id = sav9_tt.term_id AND sav9_t.language_id = #language_id#) ON sav9_tt.meaning_id = sav9.int_value LEFT JOIN sample_attribute_values sav10 ON sav10.sample_id = session.id AND sav10.sample_attribute_id = 22 AND sav10.deleted = false LEFT JOIN sample_attribute_values sav11 ON sav11.sample_id = session.id AND sav11.sample_attribute_id = 23 AND sav11.deleted = false INNER JOIN occurrences io ON io.sample_id = session.id and io.deleted = false INNER JOIN determinations id ON io.id = id.occurrence_id and id.deleted = false and id.id = (select max(id2.id) from determinations id2 where id2.occurrence_id = io.id and id2.deleted = false) INNER JOIN occurrence_images ioi ON io.id = ioi.occurrence_id and ioi.deleted = false LEFT JOIN taxa_taxon_lists ittl ON id.taxa_taxon_list_id = ittl.id LEFT JOIN taxa it ON ittl.taxon_id = it.id LEFT JOIN occurrence_attribute_values oav2 ON oav2.occurrence_id = io.id AND oav2.occurrence_attribute_id = 5 AND oav2.deleted = false LEFT JOIN occurrence_attribute_values oav3 ON oav3.deleted = false and oav3.occurrence_id = io.id and oav3.occurrence_attribute_id = 4 LEFT JOIN (termlists_terms oav3_tt JOIN terms oav3_t ON oav3_t.id = oav3_tt.term_id AND oav3_t.language_id = #language_id#) ON oav3_tt.meaning_id = oav3.int_value WHERE s.survey_id=#survey_id# AND s.deleted = FALSE AND s.parent_id IS NULL #order_by#
